trans-unit.source: Name of the certificate in Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: Azure Key Vault 中的证书名称。

trans-unit.source: Client ID to authenticate to Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: 要向 Azure Key Vault 进行身份验证的客户端 ID。

trans-unit.source: Client secret to authenticate to Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: 要向 Azure Key Vault 进行身份验证的客户端密码。

trans-unit.source: Invalid value for {0}. The value must be a fully rooted directory path.
trans-unit.target: {0} 的值无效。该值必须是完整的根目录路径。
trans-unit.note: {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"} is an option name (e.g.: --base-directory) and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: If not using a managed identity, all of these options are required: {0}, {1}, and {2}.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用托管标识，则需要以下所有选项: {0}、{1} 和 {2}。
trans-unit.note: {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}", "{1}", "{2}"} are option names and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: The file path cannot be rooted when using a glob. Use a path relative to the working directory (or base directory, if used).
trans-unit.target: 使用 glob 时，文件路径不能为根路径。请使用相对于工作目录(或基目录，如果使用)的路径。

trans-unit.source: Managed identity to authenticate to Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: 要向 Azure Key Vault 进行身份验证的托管标识。

trans-unit.source: A file or glob is required.
trans-unit.target: 文件或 glob 是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Some files do not exist. Try using a different {0} value or a fully qualified file path.
trans-unit.target: 某些文件不存在。请尝试使用其他 {0} 值或完全限定的文件路径。
trans-unit.note: {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"} is an option name (e.g.: --base-directory) and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Tenant ID to authenticate to Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: 要向 Azure Key Vault 进行身份验证的租户 ID。

trans-unit.source: URL to an Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: 指向 Azure Key Vault 的 URL。
